title: Frontotemporal Dementia
Definition: Acquired, pregoressive, degenerative disorder causing global impairments of all aspects of cogniiton with the preservation of consciousness
Symptoms: BPSD: Behavioural and affective changes, psychotic symptoms. Specific: dsexecutive issues, hyperorality, personality change, early loss of insight
Management: patient adaptations, social support, support carers, optimise physical health, psychotherapy, psychotropic medication
